title: Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace National Historic Site: Guided Tours
body: Guided Tours         The landmark designation plaque for Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace. nps  Guided tours are available of the five 1865 period rooms. There are no self-guided tours. Park Ranger guided tours are available on the hour: 10 am 11 am 1 pm 2 pm 3 pm 4 pm Each tour is limited to 18 people and lasts approximately 40 minutes. Late comers will be asked to join a later tour. Those who miss the 4 p.m. tour will need to return the following day. Groups of 10 or more need to call (212) 260-1616 and speak with a Ranger to book a group visit. Voice mail messages cannot be used for confirmation. The Upper Gallery is currently closed to the public due to renovations.
